About.UpperIntro: I have always been fascinated by the many ways in which programming can be used for automation. And there are no limits to creativity. As in archery, it is important to always have the focus and the goal in mind. To offer the end customer an optimal experience.
About.LowerIntro: I am a Frontend Developer with a passion for creating modern and responsive web applications. I am experienced in Angular, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills. I also learned that collaborating with other developers and solving problems as part of a team is one of the most rewarding experiences I've ever had.
About.FirstFocus: One interesting aspect is A11Y (accessibility) and the associated accessibility. This goes hand in hand with UI/UX patterns and the creation of UI components. As well as the integration of UI libraries such as Angular Material etc together with theming.
About.SecondFocus: I am no stranger to frameworks such as Angular and I have already gained some experience in the development of single page applications.
About.SkillsExplain: At this point my frontend development skills, which I have used in several single and group projects. More on that in the projects section.

Projects.PortfolioDescription: This is my portfolio. It is a single page application. It is a responsive and modern web application that showcases my skills and projects.
Projects.PokedexDescription: A Pokemon database from a REST API.
Projects.JoinDescription: Ticketboard with Contactlist and Login, with Rest-Api and Backend.
